subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /LC's Radio Shack Hack Recordings/is2008pivotal_TO_THE_UNIVERSE_CLEAR_UNIVERSE_SHIFT12508.wav 
  Uploaded by : lcdupla <lcdupla@...> 
  Description : 12508 RS12470: Q: "Is 2008 pivotal?"  A: "To the universe clear...universal shift."  I had accidently cut off the "universal shift" part on the other recording.   

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/LC%27s%20Radio%20Shack%20Hack%20Recordings/is2008pivotal_TO_THE_UNIVERSE_CLEAR_UNIVERSE_SHIFT12508.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

lcdupla <lcdupla@...>
